officialTitle: Outcomes of Sentinel Node Biopsy According to MRI Response in an Association With the Subtypes in cN1-3 Breast Cancer After Neoadjuvant Systemic Therapy
conditions: Breast Cancer, Breast MRI, Neoadjuvant Systemic Therapy, Sentinel Lymph Node
primaryOutcomeMeasure: False negative rate of sentinel lymph node biopsy according to radiologic response stratified by brest cancer subtype
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* cN1-3 breast cancer at initial presentation
* received neoadjuvant systemic therapy (NAST)
* received sentinel lymph node biopsy (SLNB) followed by additional axillary lymph node dissection (ALND)
* breast MRI performed at baseline and post-NAST.

Exclusion Criteria:

* case with unavailable data for breast MRI and operation
